title: A Sensorial Approach to Montessori Teaching
headline: Learn about the different ways to take a sensorial approach to teaching Montessori children in this free online course.
description: This comprehensive course is designed for Montessori teachers willing to help their students by enhancing their basic sensory modalities. According to research, sensory play strengthens the connections between neurons in the child's brain, enabling them to perform more challenging learning activities successfully. Explore the Montessori principles relevant to the sensorial approach and discover what activities will benefit children.

courseDescription:
Children are like plants that need proper care and nurturing or they will wither. Similarly, just like you need to take appropriate measures to ensure optimum growth of plants, you must also look for ways to nurture children physically, mentally and cognitively. In this regard, the Montessori teaching method is one of the most well-renowned methods for educating children. It uses several strategies to ensure optimal physical and cognitive growth.

In this regard, the sensorial approach enhances children's primary sensory modalities. Therefore, to help Montessori teachers provide adequate sensorial training to their students, Montessori Pro has designed this comprehensive course. This course consists of one module and four topics. Under these topics, you will find how children use their senses to explore the world around them and how you can help them in this regard.

You will also find various principles of Montessori teaching concerning sensorial approach embedded in each topic, along with an engaging Montessori activity. All the exercises presented in this course are simple to perform and allow the children to use their sensory modalities to their maximum potential. The language used throughout is uncomplicated, and it contains various images and infographics to help you comprehensively grasp the discussed concepts. After completing this course and taking its assessment, you will be eligible to apply for its certificate.
